overview.en: Ethernity Chain (ERN) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Ethernity Chain has a current supply of 30,000,000 with 4,340,000 in circulation. The last known price of Ethernity Chain is 50.42797338 USD and is up 21.93 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 8 active market(s) with $29,259,688.80 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://ethernity.io/.
